market_scaling_fractions_source.title: CBECS 2018 - Table E1 -  Major fuels consumption by end use, 2018
market_scaling_fractions_source.fraction_derivation: Cooling fraction reflects share of primary heating that is electric (221 TBtus cooling in buildings with electric primary heating / 589 TBtus cooling in all buildings); ventilation fraction is portion of buildings where cooling is not served by chiller (703 TBtus space heating w/ chiller/district cooling out of 2167 TBtus space heating across all buildings) multiplied by portion where heating is electric (221 TBtus cooling in buildings with electric primary heating / 589 TBtus cooling in all buildings).
